alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 3:13PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sweetwater County through 400 PM MDT... At 312 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Superior, which is also 14 miles northeast of Rock Springs, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Sweetwater County, including the following locations... Southwest Wyoming Regional Airport, Reliance, Bitter Creek, Tipton, Point Of Rocks and Sweetwater County Fairgrounds. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 103 and 161. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Rock Springs and Green River
